SEARCH
Module webfx.stack.orm.expression
Package dev.webfx.stack.orm.expression.lci

Interface DomainWriter<T>

Type Parameters:
T - The expected java class for domain objects.
All Superinterfaces:
DomainReader<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
EntityDomainWriter
public interface DomainWriter<T> extends DomainReader<T>
Loose coupling interface used by expressions to write date (into domain objects and parameters).
Author:
Bruno Salmon
